description:
Flora is a new way to stay off your phone, clear to-do lists, and build positive, life-changing habits. Whenever you want to make progress towards your goals, plant a seed in Flora. As you work hard, the seed will grow into a healthy tree. Let the tree be your coach and grow yourself with it. You will be amazed by how great you can be.

FOCUS TREES

Have trouble putting down the phone? Flora blocks distracting apps in a pleasant way to help you focus on what’s more important in real life. If you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app while growing a tree, the tree will be killed! But if succeeding, you'll unlock new trees.

DOUBLE EFFICIENCY WITH FRIENDS 

Things get even more interesting when you challenge your friends to plant trees together—you will see who kills a tree (ouch). However, if you successfully stay away from your phones together, each of you will win an additional tree from a random friend. You can also chat and share your progress to motivate each other and keep everyone on track.*

* Flora is the original app for multi-user tree planting and delivers the best features that help you and your friends be productive. 

TO-DO LIST & WIDGET

Flora is a to-do list, and more. Simply create a to-do item and set a reminder, then you will never forget a thing. Even better, you can tag your trees with a to-do item to easily track the progress towards each of your life goals. No matter if your goal is daily, weekly, or monthly, Flora will help you follow it through and achieve it.

HABIT TRACKER

Enjoy a rewarding daily habit routine. If you grow trees regularly, you will earn yourself a beautiful, vibrant garden. Take a look at it and feel proud of yourself! Each tree records your perseverance and a step towards a healthy life. You can also view the daily, weekly, or monthly statistics of your activities in Flora to find opportunities to improve your time-management and planning skills.

REAL TREES, REAL IMPACT

Why not plant REAL trees while improving yourself? Flora proudly offers the opt-in Price and Care services that let you plant real trees on the earth if you kill or successfully grow a tree in the app. We partner with tree-planting organizations in Africa and East Asia, such as the Trees.org and Eden Reforestation Projects, to plant fast-growing soil rebuilding trees, fruit trees that diversify incomes and nutrition, and trees that can provide forage and fuel-wood. All these trees help make the earth greener and provide long-term financial aid to families who need it most.

Sounds good? Download Flora and join our 2,000,000+ productive users now!

Plan your day with a clear visual timeline that brings your calendar, to-dos, routines, and habit tracking together.

Join 1,500,000 people who feel calmer, focus faster, and finish more.

Perfect for work, study, travel and busy ADHD minds, Structured helps you time-block your day in minutes.

Start free to:
- Organize your day and week in an intuitive timeline with quick drag & drop
- Capture ideas instantly in Inbox and sort them later
- Sync across iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch and Mac so plans are always up to date
- Break big projects down with notes & sub-tasks
- Stay on track with a Pomodoro focus timer, Live Activities, and interactive widgets
- Personalize your planner with color-coding and hundreds of icons
- Plan seamlessly across time zones for travels
- Benefit from accessibility features like VoiceOver, Voice Control, a dyslexia-friendly font, and multiple languages

Upgrade to Structured Pro to:
- Get a complete overview by connecting your calendars and Reminders
- Build recurring tasks & routines that actually stick
- Let Structured AI draft your day with natural-language input
- Replan, automatically reschedules missed or forgotten tasks so nothing slips through
- Customize notifications to match your workflow

Structured Pro is available monthly, annually, or as a lifetime purchase.

Terms & Privacy: https://structured.app/legal

Focus Keeper is the ultimate focus timer and Pomodoro timer designed to help you boost productivity and fight against procrastination. Whether you're a student preparing for an exam, managing ADHD, or simply trying to stay focused, this app is here to make your time management easier. By leveraging the original Pomodoro method, Focus Keeper helps you break down your tasks into manageable intervals and balance work with breaks, so you can stay on track without burning out.

With a built-in study tracker, customizable settings, and an intuitive design, Focus Keeper is ideal for those who need a reliable exam timer or just want to track their progress efficiently.

Focus Keeper: Pomodoro Timer, Exam Timer, ADHD
Pomodoro – Stay true to the original technique with 25-minute sessions followed by short breaks to keep your mind sharp.

Customizable Focus Timer – Adjust the length of your sessions, short breaks, and long breaks to suit your workflow.

Exam Timer & Study Timer – Ideal for students and professionals, the product acts as a perfect exam timer to help you easily manage study sessions.

ADHD Friendly – Tailored for those with ADHD, the app’s structured technique helps improve concentration and task completion.

Time Tracker – Track your productivity over time with insightful charts and fight against ADHD and procrastination.

Simple Interface – With a clean and intuitive design, it's easy to set up your focus timer and start working on your tasks immediately.

How Its Works?
Set Your Focus Timer & Study Timer– Choose a task and set the clock for 25 minutes.
Work Until the Rings – Stay focused on your task until the Pomodoro rings.
Take a Short Break – Enjoy a 5-minute break after each session to refresh your mind.
Long Breaks – After completing 4 focus sessions, take a longer break of 20-30 minutes to recharge.
The app automatically starts the next session, so you can stay productive without interruptions.

Who Can Benefit?
Whether you're a student needing a reliable study timer for exams, a professional managing multiple tasks, or someone who struggles with ADHD, the concentration app is the perfect tool. The app provides a structured routine, making it easier to avoid distractions and procrastination. Its built-in time tracker and customizable settings ensure that you can stay productive in any environment, from the office to the study room.

Why ?
Unlike other apps, Focus Keeper offers an original Pomodoro experience while giving you full control over how you manage your focus sessions. Whether you're using it as an exam timer, a study timer, or to manage ADHD, its versatile features and easy-to-use interface make it stand out. Track your productivity over time, customize your features, and use it as a stopwatch for specific tasks – all while avoiding procrastination and staying on task.
